a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Stunting measures the share of children younger than 5 years that fall below two standard deviations from the
median height-for-age of the WHO Child Growth Standards. GDP per capita is adjusted for price changes over time
and between countries (presented in constant international-$).
Data source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
